attributes.action: Propose a statue in Manchester City Centre of Suffragette Emmeline Pankhurst
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apparently there are no 'female' statues in Manchester. How fitting then to erect a statue of the leading Manchester born Suffragette - Emmeline Pankhurst as the first 'female' representation. Thanks to Emmeline and her heroic acts for women's rights, women now have the freedom to vote.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
